name: ClearSol CHLOR LF
description: ClearSol CHLOR LF is a low-foaming surfactant system that is readily soluble in 12% active sodium hypochlorite (bleach) solutions as well as other oxidizers, including hydrogen peroxide. ClearSol CHLOR LF also provides extremely low foam properties, making this product suitable for many industrial cleaning processes, including spray cleaning. ClearSol CHLOR LF contributes to quick dynamic surface tension lowering resulting in fast wetting and spreading on various hydrophobic substrates.
